alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lincoln County through 430 PM MDT... At 357 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Troy, or 13 miles northwest of Libby, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts of 30 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Troy, Yakt and Kootenai Falls. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 2 and 13, and between mile markers 19 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
